name: AddChar.instDiscreteMeasurableSpace
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
M : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : AddMonoid A
inst✝³ : Monoid M
inst✝² : MeasurableSpace A
inst✝¹ : DiscreteMeasurableSpace A
inst✝ : Finite A
⊢ DiscreteMeasurableSpace (AddChar A M)
decl:
instance instDiscreteMeasurableSpace [DiscreteMeasurableSpace A] [Finite A] :
    DiscreteMeasurableSpace (AddChar A M) :=
  ⟨fun _ ↦ trivial⟩
